entities.name: Symptom
entities.description: A symptom associated with a disease.

entities.name: Medicine
entities.description: A drug or treatment used for diseases.

entities.description: Department in a hospital treating the disease.

entities.name: HumanBodyPart
entities.description: A human body part affected by a disease.

entities.name: Doctor
entities.description: A medical professional involved in diagnosis or treatment.

entities.name: Hospital
entities.description: Medical institution where treatment is given.

entities.name: MedicalAdvice
entities.description: Advice or diagnosis provided by doctors.

entities.name: Indicator
entities.description: Indicators or test results associated with a condition.

entities.name: HealthFood
entities.description: Food or supplements related to health improvement.

entities.name: SpecialMedicalFood
entities.description: Food designed for special medical purposes.

entities.name: Population
entities.description: The population group the content applies to.

entities.name: Vaccine
entities.description: Vaccine used for prevention of diseases.

relations.name: has_symptom
relations.head: Disease
relations.description: A symptom commonly associated with a disease.

relations.name: treated_with
relations.head: Disease
relations.description: A medication that is used to treat the disease.

relations.name: affects_part
relations.head: Disease
relations.description: The part of the human body affected by the disease.

relations.name: handled_by
relations.head: Disease
relations.description: The department of the hospital that handles the disease.

relations.name: prescribed_by
relations.head: Medicine
relations.description: The doctor who prescribes a medicine.

relations.name: complicates
relations.head: Disease
relations.description: A complication caused by another disease.

relations.name: tested_by

relations.description: Tests or diagnostics used to detect the disease.

relations.name: indicated_by
relations.head: Disease
relations.description: Medical indicators used to suggest the disease.

relations.name: operated_with

relations.description: Operations or procedures used for treatment.
